title: "Use `{@render ...}` tags instead" warning when forcing runes mode
body:
### Describe the bug

When building a Kit app that has been forced into runes mode, we get a warning because the fallback component still uses the `<slot>` syntax https://github.com/sveltejs/kit/blob/main/packages/kit/src/runtime/components/layout.svelte

### Reproduction

https://github.com/eltigerchino/kit-render-warning

Run `pnpm build` to see the warning.

### Logs

```Shell
❯ pnpm build

> my-app@0.0.1 build /Users/teeming/my-app
> vite build

vite v5.4.3 building SSR bundle for production...
transforming (1) .svelte-kit/generated/server/internal.js8:17:44 PM [vite-plugin-svelte] node_modules/.pnpm/@sveltejs+kit@2.5.26_@sveltejs+vite-plugin-svelte@4.0.0-next.7_svelte@5.0.0-next.243_vite@5.4_klrwhjhi42rganb2x3ysdqqljm/node_modules/@sveltejs/kit/src/runtime/components/layout.svelte:1:0 Using `<slot>` to render parent content is deprecated. Use `{@render ...}` tags instead
1: <slot />
           ^
2: 
✓ 109 modules transformed.
vite v5.4.3 building for production...
transforming (1) .svelte-kit/generated/client-optimized/app.js8:17:45 PM [vite-plugin-svelte] node_modules/.pnpm/@sveltejs+kit@2.5.26_@sveltejs+vite-plugin-svelte@4.0.0-next.7_svelte@5.0.0-next.243_vite@5.4_klrwhjhi42rganb2x3ysdqqljm/node_modules/@sveltejs/kit/src/runtime/components/layout.svelte:1:0 Using `<slot>` to render parent content is deprecated. Use `{@render ...}` tags instead
1: <slot />
           ^
```


### System Info

```Shell
System:
    OS: macOS 15.1
    CPU: (8) arm64 Apple M1 Pro
    Memory: 73.67 MB / 32.00 GB
    Shell: 5.9 - /bin/zsh
  Binaries:
    Node: 20.13.1 - ~/Library/pnpm/node
    npm: 10.5.2 - ~/Library/pnpm/npm
    pnpm: 9.9.0 - ~/Library/pnpm/pnpm
    bun: 1.1.26 - /opt/homebrew/bin/bun
  Browsers:
    Chrome: 128.0.6613.113
    Chrome Canary: 130.0.6687.0
    Safari: 18.1
    Safari Technology Preview: 18.0
  npmPackages:
    @sveltejs/adapter-cloudflare: ^4.7.2 => 4.7.2 
    @sveltejs/kit: ^2.5.26 => 2.5.26 
    @sveltejs/vite-plugin-svelte: ^4.0.0-next.7 => 4.0.0-next.7 
    svelte: ^5.0.0-next.243 => 5.0.0-next.243 
    vite: ^5.4.3 => 5.4.3
```


### Severity

annoyance

### Additional Information

_No response_
